ingredients.item: 1 bunch salad onions, finely chopped, greenest parts kept separate
2 tsp Santa Maria Latin American Kitchen Original Fajita Medium seasoning
225g pack Pome Dei Moro Tomatoes, finely chopped
400g can black beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Heat 2½ tsp oil in a saucepan, then add the white and pale green salad onions and corn and cook for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the fajita mix and sizzle for 1 minute more before adding the tomatoes and stock. Boil then simmer for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, brush the tortillas with ½ tsp oil, then cut into thin strips. Spread over a baking tray and bake for 8 minutes.
Stir the beans into the soup then simmer for 2 minutes till hot throughout. Season and ladle the soup into 4 bowls. Serve with the tortilla strips, avocado, lime and remaining salad onions.
